title: Move admin/organisation/supervisor-related content into separate namespace
body_html:
Rationale: we will eventually forget tossing in a cancan directive. Having a namespaced base controller with a pre-defined before_action puts us on the safer side in terms of a possible privilege escalation.

An orga/ namespace already exists.

Edit: As of late June, a students/ namespace now also exists.

body:
Rationale: we will eventually forget tossing in a cancan directive. Having a namespaced base controller with a pre-defined `before_action` puts us on the safer side in terms of a possible privilege escalation.

An `orga/` namespace already exists.

**Edit**: As of late June, a `students/` namespace now also exists.
